com.minecade.deepend.request

Class PendingRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.minecade.deepend.request.PendingRequest
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DataRequest, ShutdownRequest, StatusRequest

    public abstract class PendingRequest
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable
    This is a request which will be kept in the request buffer, until the client can send it
    Author:
    Citymonstret

      PendingRequest(Channel requestedChannel)

      Constructor which allows for UUID specification, should be used for all purposes other than authentication
